views.markdown: If you need help with "PerfectAlerts", you can contact Johnzaro , the developer, via e-mail.
Johnzaro  is the maintainer of the package "PerfectAlerts". Please contact them via email for any questions on this version of the package.
If you found a mistake in the depiction or cannot download the package, you can reach out to the maintainer of the "Johnzaro's Perfect Repo" repo, John Zarogiannis.
